item.title: [RBX8][Collaborative solutions] - MX Plan mailbox access incident notification
item.description:
Sep 26, 17:05 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

Start time : 26/09/2024 08:20 UTC
End time : 26/09/2024 15:22 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to disjunction.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Sep 26, 14:54 UTC
Identified - The incident is still ongoing. We would like to assure you that we are doing our utmost to resolve this situation as quickly as possible.

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

Thank you for your understanding.

Sep 26, 09:07 UTC
Investigating - Ongoing actions : Since 08:55 UTC, some customers are unable to access their mailboxes.
No mail lost during the incident.
However, a delay to receive mails by impacted customers is being observed.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working on the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Sep 26, 08:54 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : No more impact is being observed since 08:46 UTC.
Customers are able to access their mailboxes again and no delay to receive mails is observed anymore.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Sep 26, 08:47 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/09/2024 08:20 UTC
Service impact : Some customers are unable to access their mailboxes.
No mail lost during the incident.
However, a delay to receive mails by impacted customers is being observed.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Collaborative solutions] - MX Plan Reception incident notification
item.description:
Sep 25, 21:03 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 01/09/2024 17:00 UTC
End time : 25/09/2024 20:53:00 UTC
Root cause : This incident was due to software issue.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Sep 25, 13:17 UTC
Identified - Ongoing actions : Our technical teams identified the root cause and are currently implementing a fix to resolve the incident.
4% of the accounts that had been affected are no longer impacted.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Sep 25, 09:38 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our collaborative solutions offer.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 01/09/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : With Zimbra migration, storage of emails is migrated too and usage calculation can be differente after migration. It may generate increase of usage of mailbox.
Since Monday 23/09/24, if source mailbox was not over quota, we increase quota of mailbox over 5Go to don't generate impact for you after migration.
Ongoing actions : For customer migrated before, fix is currently in progress to increase quota.
If you want to check your quota, we advice to make it on webmail to see your real quota applied.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
